item.title: 'Celebrity Apprentice' Recap: The Power of Redemption

item.content:encoded: "I started to have a connection with Dennis" says Lil Jon moments after learning that Donald Trump had fired his teammate Rodman "But we need some wins" The rapper speaks the truth It's been a sad and lonely road for Team Power this season each week's loss all the more...

item.description: Chi Cheng bassist for nu-metal pioneers the Deftones died early Saturday morning at the age of 42 Ch[...]
item.content:encoded: Chi Cheng bassist for nu-metal pioneers the Deftones died early Saturday morning at the age of 42 Cheng had been seriously injured in a car accident in 2008; he fell into a coma and never fully recovered Although it had been years since Cheng was playing music in the public...

item.content:encoded: British up-and-comer Jake Bugg confesses that he's not a huge fan of festivals but even he admits he had fun after taking the stage at Coachella this year "It was brilliant" he says "It's always nice to come to another country and see the same reaction that's been going on...

item.content:encoded: Psy may have set a high bar for himself in following up on his massive hit "Gangnam Style" which became the most-watched video in YouTube history by garnering 15 billion hits So he gave his new video "Gentleman" a suitably grand introduction premiering the video during a concert at Seoul's...
